data.title: CDTFA: How to Calculate the Cannabis Excise Tax on Nonarm’s Length Transactions
data.excerpt: Distributors or microbusinesses authorized to operate as distributors are required to calculate and collect the 15 percent cannabis excise tax from cannabis retailers on the sale or transfer of cannabis or cannabis products (cannabis) based on the average market price of the cannabis.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California department of tax and fee administration
